procedureTime.question: How long does the procedure take?
procedureTime.answer: Most procedures take 6-8 hours, depending on the extent of transplantation needed

resultsTime.question: When will I see results?
resultsTime.answer: Initial growth begins in 3-4 months, with full results visible in 12-18 months

painLevel.question: Is the procedure painful?
painLevel.answer: The procedure is performed under local anesthesia, ensuring minimal discomfort

recoveryTime.question: What is the recovery time?
recoveryTime.answer: Most patients return to work within 3-5 days, with full recovery in 2-3 weeks

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2008, Este Nove has grown from a small clinic to a global leader in hair restoration. Our journey is marked by continuous innovation, unwavering commitment to patient care, and a passion for delivering life-changing results. Today, we proudly serve patients from over 50 countries, combining Harvard-affiliated expertise with cutting-edge technology.

gallery.title: Before & After Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Explore our collection of successful transformations and real patient results

fue1.description: Complete hairline restoration with natural density
fue1.details: FUE procedure with 4400 grafts targeting the frontal and mid-scalp areas. Patient experienced significant improvement in density and natural hairline appearance.

dhi1.description: Advanced DHI technique for precise implantation
dhi1.details: DHI procedure with 4000 grafts focusing on the crown area. The technique allowed for precise angle and depth control, resulting in natural hair growth direction.

combined1.details: Combined approach using FUE and DHI techniques to address both crown area and hairline. Treatment included PRP therapy for enhanced results.

meta.title: Sapphire FUE Hair Transplant - Advanced Hair Restoration
meta.description: Experience the latest in FUE hair transplant technology with sapphire blades for minimal scarring and natural-looking results.

sapphireFue.title: Sapphire FUE Hair Transplant
sapphireFue.description: Sapphire FUE is an advanced hair transplantation technique that uses specially designed sapphire blades for more precise and less traumatic incisions.
preparation: Stop smoking at least one week before surgery
Don't drink alcohol 3 days before procedure
Get adequate rest before the surgery
Wear comfortable clothing on surgery day
recovery: Rest for 24-48 hours after the procedure
Sleep with head elevated for first week

meta.title: DHI Hair Transplant - Direct Hair Implantation
meta.description: Experience the most advanced DHI hair transplant technique for natural-looking results with minimal recovery time.

dhi.title: DHI Hair Transplant
dhi.description: Direct Hair Implantation (DHI) is an advanced hair transplant technique that enables precise placement of hair follicles for the most natural-looking results.

meta.title: Stem Cell Hair Treatment - Advanced Hair Restoration
meta.description: Experience innovative stem cell therapy for natural hair regeneration with minimal recovery time.

stemCell.title: Stem Cell Hair Treatment
stemCell.description: Our stem cell therapy harnesses your body's natural regenerative capabilities to stimulate hair growth and improve follicle health.
